name: Make Play Code Christmas Bonanza 2017 (Where's my hat?)
name_original: Make Play Code Christmas Bonanza 2017 (Where's my hat?)
description:
Made by the following collaborators at December 2017's Make Play Code Brunch:
AC Godliman, Becklespinax, profaniti, Sophiaaar, irny, ikoyuo, techkitty

We all made one screen in flickgame (www.flickgame.org) while eating a large amount of chips and drinking tea.
